question: Can we give a copy of the Quraan in Arabic with English Translation to a non-muslim.
answer:
QUESTION

Can we give a copy of the Quraan in Arabic with English Translation to a non-muslim.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is permissible to give a copy of the Quran to a non-Muslim if one honestly feels the non-Muslim will respect the Quran. When giving the Quran to a non-Muslim, advise him on the respect of the Quran.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
